abstract: New York Red Bulls defeat DC United, 3-0.
lead_paragraph: Bouncing back from a sloppy loss to the Chicago Fire on Wednesday, the Red Bulls jumped on United early, dominated possession and spent most of the game in the United half of the field.

headline.main: Red Bulls Outdo a Rival and Climb the Standings
headline.print_headline: Red Bulls Outdo a Rival and Climb the Standings
